title: Check the MOT history of a vehicle

details.description: Check the MOT history of a vehicle - get a full MOT test history and mileage of the vehicle at the time of each test
details.more_information:
You'll need the vehicle registration mark and either:

- the MOT test number (you can get this from the VT20 test certificate or the VT30 refusal certificate)
- the document reference number from the V5C registration certificate (logbook) if you don't have the MOT test number

^Test history records start from 2005.^

##Checking if an MOT certificate is genuine

You can check if your MOT certificate is genuine by checking its details against what's recorded online.

*[VOSA]: Vehicle and Operator Services Agency
details.introduction: Enter vehicle details to see a history of full MOT test details and mileage at the time of each MOT test.

details.description: Includes getting an MOT, MOT fees and vehicle insurance

The MOT test fees for different kinds of vehicles - bikes, cars, caravans, passenger and goods vehicles

related.title: Check the MOT status of a vehicle

details.description: Find out the MOT test status of a vehicle - check the date of the test, the odometer reading (mileage) and the expiry date of a test pass
